description: Ease and convenience of booking a service appointment, including availability of time slots and booking channels.
Customer experience during vehicle drop-off, including welcome, check-in process, and initial communication.
Perceived expertise, courtesy, and professionalism of the service advisor handling the case.
Accuracy of identifying vehicle issues and correctly diagnosing the root cause of problems.
Effectiveness and reliability of the repair or maintenance work performed on the vehicle.
Whether the issue was resolved correctly on the first visit without the need for repeat service.
Time taken to complete the service compared to the promised or expected completion time.
Whether the vehicle was returned to the customer at the agreed date and time.
Clarity and transparency of pricing, estimates, and final invoices before and after service.
Customer perception of whether service and repair costs are reasonable and justified.
Process of informing customers and obtaining consent for additional repairs or services.
Availability of required spare parts and its impact on service time and completion.
Customer confidence that genuine or approved parts were used during service or repair.
Experience with warranty coverage, claims processing, and related communication.
Condition and cleanliness of the vehicle when returned after service.
Availability and quality of replacement vehicles or mobility solutions during service.
Frequency and clarity of updates provided during the service or repair process.
Speed and accessibility of customer support for service-related questions or issues.
Whether the same problem reappeared after the service was completed.
Perception of the service center�s cleanliness, comfort, and overall environment.
Friendliness, respectfulness, and customer-oriented behavior of service staff.
Quality of explanations and follow-up communication after service completion.
Overall level of trust in the service center�s honesty, competence, and intentions.
Customer willingness to return to the same service center for future maintenance or repairs.
Likelihood that the customer would recommend the service center to others.
Feedback that does not clearly fall into any specific category
Feedback that contains any other topic
